alert.note: Alert for Butts; Henry; Jasper; Morgan; Newton; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 12:19AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Morgan, southeastern Henry, southeastern Walton, north central Butts, northwestern Jasper and Newton Counties through 1245 AM EST... At 1218 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Almon to Ola to Luella, and moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Covington, Social Circle, Oxford, Porterdale, Rutledge, Newborn, Mansfield, Stewart, Ola, Almon, Starrsville, Hard Labor Creek State Park, Brick Store, Fincherville, Rocky Plains and Luella. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Henry; Jasper; Morgan; Newton; Walton
